subtitle: This light snack is good for a breakfast, brunch, starter or lunch. Serve with toast or crusty bread.

method.text: Place the butter in a ramekin dish. Place in the oven and heat through for 1-2 min or until melted.
Beat the cream, herbs and seasoning together. Break the egg into the ramekin and sprinkle over the ham.
Pour over the cream mixture and cook for 4-6 min in the oven. Serve immediately.

title: Herby baked egg with ham
